title: Action Research-Based Workshop for Enhancing Generative AI and Critical Questioning Skills

context.prior_knowledge: Fundamental digital literacy and experience using generative AI tools
context.additional_context: For learners interested in the societal impact and critical use of generative AI as working professionals. Conducted in a constrained technology environment based on smartphones.

learning_goals: Learners can generate three or more critical questions to evaluate the source and credibility of AI-generated text.
Learners can conduct case studies by applying a question framework that analyzes bias potential in generative AI within social contexts.
Learners can design a critical feedback loop for AI-generated content with peer learners using action research methodology.

resources: Smartphone-compatible generative AI tools (ChatGPT Lite, Gemini Mobile)
Digital field note template for ethnographic observation
constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
